sub_title: Creating inspiring workplaces & empowering people | Currently scaling teams @ Bitvavo
summary:
I am currently leading an awesome talent acquisition team at Bitvavo, an Amsterdam based scale-up that aims to bridge the gap between traditional currencies and digital assets. In 2018, Bitvavo launched the first version of its digital assets trading platform and by offering transparent fees, a wide range of assets and an easy to use platform, Bitvavo is making the currency of the future accessible for everyone.

In three years time, Bitvavo has established itself as the market leader in the Benelux, with 1MIO+ users exchanging over billion euros worth of digital assets a month.

We are scaling and looking for an ambitious people with a passion for digital assets! We have open positions in Engineering (NodeJS | TS | Golang | HPC | React | React Native), Blockchain, Marketing, Financial Crime, KYC & Risk. Visit jobs.bitvavo.com and find out more about us!

More about me:
After the realisation that I will not make it as a professional musician I decided to focus my creativity elsewhere (I keep telling myself that I was close though...). I have worked in many different fields and companies ranging from NGOs, start-ups, corporations and public institutions only to find my passion for people development and technology. I decided to combine them first as a trainer and coach, and later as a talent acquisition, HR and start-up enthusiast.

I am on a journey to create inspiring workplaces where people will thrive and grow while still having an excellent work-life balance. Alongside I empower people with the necessary skills, tips & tricks to be successful at their job search and able to build careers they always wanted. I am a fan of technology, innovation and various hacks, I do things differently...and that makes it a lot of fun!

Some keywords:
Employer Branding | Recruitment Marketing | Candidate Experience | Strategic Sourcing | Tech Recruitment | HR Tech | Agile HR | Start-Up Recruitment | Career Coaching | Interview training

In my free time you can mostly find me playing music and practicing calisthenics. 

Now you know all about me! I would also like to know about you, so do not hesitate to connect here on LinkedIn or contact me at tomas.haviar@bitvavo.com.

profile_positions.description:
In 2018, Bitvavo launched the first version of its digital assets trading platform, to bridge the gap between traditional currencies and digital assets. By offering transparent fees, a wide range of assets and an easy to use platform, Bitvavo is making the currency of the future accessible for everyone.

In three years time, Bitvavo has established itself as the market leader in the Benelux, with 1MIO+ users exchanging over billion euros worth of digital assets a month.
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition Lead

profile_positions.description:
The Hacking HR is a global movement . . . a connected and collaborative community of holistic professionals looking to co-learn about the intersection between the future of work, technology, and HR.

We are inspired by the intersection of HR and technology. We are curious about how HR and tech influence when, where and how we work, who we work with and what skills the organizational leaders of tomorrow will need.

Our purpose is to build a community of like-minded HR and tech professionals and enthusiasts interested in human development and technology and how to make them work for the benefit of everybody
profile_positions.title: Hacking HR Partner (Amsterdam Chapter)

profile_positions.description:
Mollie is a fintech company providing payment solutions for more than 55.000 entrepreneurs all over the globe. 

We believe in the strength of simplicity. With this simplicity, we want to challenge the standard in payments by testing the boundaries of tech, by always looking one step further, and by providing a strong but simple API to advance your business opportunities. 

At Mollie we strive to help all entrepreneurs: from a small webshop owner who is taking a first step into the e-commerce landscape to corporate-like organizations trying to change the world. We want to help our customers grow, increase their productivity, and reach their business goals by providing them with the most efficient money management.

Grow wherever you want, and don't let borders define your business!  We provide all major payments methods such as Mastercard, VISA, Amex, PayPal, iDEAL, Bancontact, Bitcoin, SEPA Direct Debit, Cartes Bancaires, EPS, Giropay, SOFORT Banking and more to help you grow locally and globally.
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition Business Partner & Employer Branding Lead

profile_positions.description:
I was a talent acquisition lead for the leading SaaS platform for marketers and branding specialists. I was responsible for hiring across all the commercial and support departments as well as engineering in the Netherlands, Spain, U.K., and U.S., Some of my main accomplishments include:
- Setting up the global talent acquisition strategy for the engineering, sales and marketing department
- Setting up the global employer branding strategy supporting our hiring needs
- Successful hire of 100+ engineers, sales, marketing and business support specialist
- Successful implementation of ATS SmartRecruiters
- Leading a successful merger of two talent acquisition teams after an M&A
- Delivery of an interview and candidate experience training to the hiring managers
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition& Employer Branding Lead

profile_positions.location: The Europeum, Suché mýto 1, 811 03 Bratislava, Slovakia
profile_positions.description:
Internal corporate recruiter and headhunter for the whole NATEK Group - a key player in the field of IT outsourcing and consulting in CEE region (Central and Eastern Europe). 
-  Managing the full end-to-end recruitment cycle of internal employees for the whole NATEK Group - sourcing, attracting, screening, interviewing, hiring and on-boarding
-  Playing an active role in development of the recruitment strategy in cooperation with the HR Manager of the NATEK Group
-  Developing the corporate policy for talent bench-marking, talent assessment and interviewing policies 
-  Counseling candidates on corporate benefits, salary, and corporate environment
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition Consultant
